EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Denver_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Atlanta. For those attending the Data Science Workshop, please remember to bring your own laptop
Date: Tuesday, 15 August 2017
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop
Location:
Technology Square Research Building <[[http://mshci.gatech.edu/directions]]> 85 Fifth Street NW Atlanta, GA 30308 Room: Banquet Hall (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Technology+Square+Research+Building,+85+5th+St+NW,+Atlanta,+GA+30308/@33.7773189,-84.3922126,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x88f50466db4dc359:0x3e130665d2d8138b!8m2!3d33.7773189!4d-84.3900186]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
Parking:
There is a parking deck adjacent to the venue at 75 5th St NW Atlanta, GA, 30308
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>. Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
